html:
Improvement was updated by Joel Moss in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 12:27.

codio-6227 New rules for the bitbucket integration. Created by Vasiliy Levykin
There will be no free private projects for projects imported from bitbucket.

UI and messages need to be changed.

There should be a check for a subscription when a project is imported.
State New → Current
